other_tests.findings: Diffuse arteriosclerotic lesions, good collateral circulation, and intact posterior tibial artery with flow of the vascular foot arcade.
Perfusion was pulsatile and estimated to be adequate to support healing at the midfoot level.

other_tests.changes_over_time: At three months, full weight-bearing was allowed; at seven months, the patient had a good clinical result with no need for a temporary prosthesis.
